metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Waypoint Integrations.

integration.name: Files
integration.description: The Files plugin generates a value representing a path on disk, and can copy them to a specific directory.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

activeRelease.readme:
The Files plugin generates a value representing a path on disk, and can copy
them to a specific directory.

### Components

1. [Builder](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/files/latest/components/builder/files-builder)
2. [Registry](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/files/latest/components/registry/files-registry)

### Related Plugins

1. [Exec](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/exec)

components.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Generates a value representing a path on disk.

### Interface

- Input: **component.Source**
- Output: **files.Files**

### Examples

```hcl
build {
  use "files" {}
}
```
components.name: Files Builder

components.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Copies files to a specific directory.

### Interface

- Input: **files.Files**
- Output: **files.Files**

### Examples

```hcl
build {
  use "files" {}
  registry {
	use "files" {
	  path = "/path/to/file"
	}
  }
}
```
components.name: Files Registry

variables.description: the filesystem path to store the files into

component.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Generates a value representing a path on disk.

### Interface

- Input: **component.Source**
- Output: **files.Files**

### Examples

```hcl
build {
  use "files" {}
}
```
